attributes.action: Seek INDEPENDANT scientific advice on the costs / benfits before commiting huge sums of money to create new land based wind farms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again the Government is being pressured by the EU, this time into spending BILLIONS of pounds on renewable energy. Unfortunately, however, rather than going for sensible and cost effective systems, we are told that the Prime Minister favours a huge increase in land based wind turbines, which scientific evidence shows, are high cost & low benefit.
